+<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
+<selector xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android">
+    <item android:drawable="@drawable/actionbar_discover_selected" android:state_pressed="true"></item>
+    <item android:state_selected="true" android:drawable="@drawable/actionbar_discover_selected"></item>
+    <item android:drawable="@drawable/actionbar_discover_prs" android:state_selected="false"></item>
+    <item android:state_pressed="false" android:drawable="@drawable/actionbar_discover_prs"></item>
+</selector>

     android:layout_width="match_parent"

@@ -0,0 +1,39 @@
+<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
+<LinearLayout xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android"
+    android:orientation="vertical" android:layout_width="match_parent"
+    android:layout_height="match_parent"
+    >
+    <LinearLayout
+        android:id="@+id/anchor_head"
+        android:layout_width="match_parent"
+        android:layout_height="22dp"
+        android:layout_gravity="center"
+        android:layout_marginTop="10dp"
+        android:orientation="horizontal">
+
+        <TextView
+            android:layout_width="2dp"
+            android:layout_height="match_parent"
+            android:layout_marginLeft="10dp"
+            android:background="@color/themeColor" />
+
+        <TextView
+            android:layout_width="wrap_content"
+            android:layout_height="match_parent"
+            android:layout_gravity="center_horizontal"
+            android:layout_marginLeft="5dp"
+            android:text="精彩节目推荐"
+            android:textColor="#000000"
+            android:textSize="16sp" />
+    </LinearLayout>
+
+    <ListView
+        android:id="@+id/anchor_list_view"
+        android:layout_width="match_parent"
+        android:layout_height="match_parent"
+        android:layout_marginLeft="10dp"
+        android:layout_marginBottom="70dp"
+        >
+
+    </ListView>
+</LinearLayout>
\ No newline at end of file

@@ -0,0 +1,52 @@
+<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
+<RelativeLayout xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android"
+    android:layout_width="match_parent"
+    android:layout_height="match_parent"
+    android:orientation="vertical"
+    android:paddingBottom="5dp"
+    android:paddingTop="5dp">
+
+    <LinearLayout
+        android:layout_width="match_parent"
+        android:layout_height="wrap_content"
+        android:orientation="horizontal">
+
+        <ImageView
+            android:id="@+id/anchor_image"
+            android:layout_width="110dp"
+            android:layout_height="110dp"
+            android:layout_marginBottom="5dp"
+            android:layout_marginLeft="10dp"
+            android:layout_marginTop="5dp" />
+
+        <LinearLayout
+            android:layout_width="wrap_content"
+            android:layout_height="wrap_content"
+            android:layout_gravity="center_vertical"
+            android:layout_marginBottom="5dp"
+            android:layout_marginLeft="5dp"
+            android:layout_marginTop="5dp"
+            android:orientation="vertical"
+            android:padding="5dp">
+
+            <TextView
+                android:id="@+id/anchor_first_txt"
+                android:layout_width="wrap_content"
+                android:layout_height="wrap_content"
+                android:layout_margin="2dp"
+                android:text="ColdPlay"
+                android:textColor="#000000"
+                android:textSize="14sp" />
+
+            <TextView
+                android:id="@+id/anchor_second_txt"
+                android:layout_width="wrap_content"
+                android:layout_height="wrap_content"
+                android:layout_margin="2dp"
+                android:text="NewYork"
+                android:textColor="#7D7D7D"
+                android:textSize="12sp" />
+        </LinearLayout>
+
+    </LinearLayout>
+</RelativeLayout>
\ No newline at end of file

@@ -0,0 +1,95 @@
+<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
+<RelativeLayout xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android"
+    android:id="@+id/bottom_layout"
+    android:layout_width="match_parent"
+    android:layout_height="wrap_content">
+
+    <LinearLayout
+        android:id="@+id/music_control"
+        android:layout_width="match_parent"
+        android:layout_height="50dp"
+        android:layout_alignParentBottom="true"
+        android:background="#ffffff"
+        android:orientation="horizontal">
+
+        <ImageView
+            android:layout_width="50dp"
+            android:layout_height="match_parent"
+            android:padding="3dp"
+            android:scaleType="fitXY"
+            android:src="@mipmap/bottom_music" />
+
+        <LinearLayout
+            android:layout_width="0dp"
+            android:layout_height="match_parent"
+            android:layout_marginLeft="10dp"
+            android:layout_weight="1"
+            android:orientation="vertical">
+
+            <TextView
+                android:layout_width="wrap_content"
+                android:layout_height="0dp"
+                android:layout_weight="60"
+                android:text="Yellow"
+                android:textColor="#000000"
+                android:textSize="15sp" />
+
+            <TextView
+                android:layout_width="wrap_content"
+                android:layout_height="0dp"
+                android:layout_weight="40"
+                android:text="ColdPlay"
+                android:textColor="#7D7D7D"
+                android:textSize="10sp" />
+
+        </LinearLayout>
+
+        <LinearLayout
+            android:id="@+id/bottom_music_more"
+            android:layout_width="45dp"
+            android:layout_height="match_parent"
+            android:layout_gravity="center_vertical"
+            android:background="@drawable/list_bg"
+            android:clickable="true"
+            android:orientation="vertical">
+
+            <ImageView
+                android:layout_width="45dp"
+                android:layout_height="match_parent"
+                android:scaleType="fitCenter"
+                android:src="@mipmap/playerlist" />
+        </LinearLayout>
+
+        <LinearLayout
+            android:layout_width="45dp"
+            android:layout_height="match_parent"
+            android:layout_gravity="center_vertical"
+            android:background="@drawable/list_bg"
+            android:clickable="true"
+            android:orientation="vertical">
+
+            <ImageView
+                android:id="@+id/play_btn"
+                android:layout_width="45dp"
+                android:layout_height="match_parent"
+                android:background="@drawable/list_bg"
+                android:src="@mipmap/play_btn" />
+        </LinearLayout>
+
+        <LinearLayout
+            android:layout_width="45dp"
+            android:layout_height="match_parent"
+            android:layout_gravity="center_vertical"
+            android:background="@drawable/list_bg"
+            android:clickable="true"
+            android:orientation="vertical">
+
+            <ImageView
+                android:layout_width="45dp"
+                android:layout_height="match_parent"
+                android:scaleType="fitCenter"
+                android:src="@mipmap/next_normal" />
+        </LinearLayout>
+    </LinearLayout>
+
+</RelativeLayout>
\ No newline at end of file

@@ -0,0 +1,329 @@
+<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
+<LinearLayout xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android"
+    xmlns:app="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res-auto"
+    android:id="@+id/navigation_view"
+    android:layout_width="match_parent"
+    android:layout_height="match_parent"
+    android:background="@color/white"
+    android:fitsSystemWindows="true"
+    android:orientation="vertical">
+
+    <ImageView
+        android:layout_width="match_parent"
+        android:layout_height="180dp"
+        android:scaleType="centerCrop"
+        android:src="@mipmap/topinfo_ban_bg" />
+
+    <LinearLayout
+        android:layout_width="match_parent"
+        android:layout_height="45dp"
+        android:layout_marginTop="8dp"
+        android:background="@drawable/item_background"
+        android:clickable="true"
+        android:focusable="true"
+        android:focusableInTouchMode="true"
+        android:gravity="center_vertical"
+        android:orientation="horizontal">
+
+        <ImageView
+            android:layout_width="30dp"
+            android:layout_height="30dp"
+            android:layout_marginLeft="10dp"
+            android:layout_marginRight="10dp"
+            android:src="@mipmap/topmenu_icn_msg" />
+
+        <TextView
+            android:layout_width="wrap_content"
+            android:layout_height="wrap_content"
+            android:text="我的消息"
+            android:textColor="@android:color/black"
+            android:textSize="15sp" />
+    </LinearLayout>
+
+
+    <LinearLayout
+        android:layout_width="match_parent"
+        android:layout_height="45dp"
+        android:background="@drawable/item_background"
+        android:clickable="true"
+        android:focusable="true"
+        android:focusableInTouchMode="true"
+        android:gravity="center_vertical"
+        android:orientation="horizontal">
+
+        <RelativeLayout
+            android:layout_width="match_parent"
+            android:layout_height="match_parent">
+
+            <ImageView
+                android:id="@+id/icn_store"
+                android:layout_width="30dp"
+                android:layout_height="30dp"
+                android:layout_centerVertical="true"
+                android:layout_marginLeft="10dp"
+                android:layout_marginRight="10dp"
+                android:src="@mipmap/topmenu_icn_store" />
+
+            <TextView
+                android:layout_width="wrap_content"
+                android:layout_height="wrap_content"
+                android:layout_centerVertical="true"
+                android:layout_toRightOf="@+id/icn_store"
+                android:text="积分商城"
+                android:textColor="@android:color/black"
+                android:textSize="15sp" />
+
+            <TextView
+                android:layout_width="wrap_content"
+                android:layout_height="wrap_content"
+                android:layout_alignParentRight="true"
+                android:layout_centerVertical="true"
+                android:layout_marginRight="20dp"
+                android:text="189积分"
+                android:textColor="#C0C0C0"
+                android:textSize="10sp" />
+        </RelativeLayout>
+    </LinearLayout>
+
+    <LinearLayout
+        android:layout_width="match_parent"
+        android:layout_height="45dp"
+        android:background="@drawable/item_background"
+        android:clickable="true"
+        android:focusable="true"
+        android:focusableInTouchMode="true"
+        android:gravity="center_vertical"
+        android:orientation="horizontal">
+
+        <ImageView
+            android:layout_width="30dp"
+            android:layout_height="30dp"
+            android:layout_marginLeft="10dp"
+            android:layout_marginRight="10dp"
+            android:src="@mipmap/topmenu_icn_member" />
+
+        <TextView
+            android:layout_width="wrap_content"
+            android:layout_height="wrap_content"
+            android:text="付费音乐包"
+            android:textColor="@android:color/black"
+            android:textSize="15sp" />
+    </LinearLayout>
+
+
+    <LinearLayout
+        android:layout_width="match_parent"
+        android:layout_height="45dp"
+        android:background="@drawable/item_background"
+        android:clickable="true"
+        android:focusable="true"
+        android:focusableInTouchMode="true"
+        android:gravity="center_vertical"
+        android:orientation="horizontal">
+
+        <ImageView
+            android:layout_width="30dp"
+            android:layout_height="30dp"
+            android:layout_marginLeft="10dp"
+            android:layout_marginRight="10dp"
+            android:src="@mipmap/topmenu_icn_free" />
+
+        <TextView
+            android:layout_width="wrap_content"
+            android:layout_height="wrap_content"
+            android:text="在线听歌免流量"
+            android:textColor="@android:color/black"
+            android:textSize="15sp" />
+    </LinearLayout>
+
+    <TextView
+        android:layout_width="match_parent"
+        android:layout_height="0.1dp"
+        android:background="#C0C0C0" />
+
+    <LinearLayout
+        android:layout_width="match_parent"
+        android:layout_height="45dp"
+        android:background="@drawable/item_background"
+        android:clickable="true"
+        android:focusable="true"
+        android:focusableInTouchMode="true"
+        android:gravity="center_vertical"
+        android:orientation="horizontal">
+
+        <ImageView
+            android:layout_width="30dp"
+            android:layout_height="30dp"
+            android:layout_marginLeft="10dp"
+            android:layout_marginRight="10dp"
+            android:src="@mipmap/topmenu_icn_identify" />
+
+        <TextView
+            android:layout_width="wrap_content"
+            android:layout_height="wrap_content"
+            android:text="听歌识曲"
+            android:textColor="@android:color/black"
+            android:textSize="15sp" />
+    </LinearLayout>
+
+    <LinearLayout
+        android:layout_width="match_parent"
+        android:layout_height="45dp"
+        android:background="@drawable/item_background"
+        android:clickable="true"
+        android:focusable="true"
+        android:focusableInTouchMode="true"
+        android:gravity="center_vertical"
+        android:orientation="horizontal">
+
+        <RelativeLayout
+            android:layout_width="match_parent"
+            android:layout_height="match_parent">
+
+            <ImageView
+                android:id="@+id/icn_skin"
+                android:layout_width="30dp"
+                android:layout_height="30dp"
+                android:layout_centerVertical="true"
+                android:layout_marginLeft="10dp"
+                android:layout_marginRight="10dp"
+                android:src="@mipmap/topmenu_icn_skin" />
+
+            <TextView
+                android:layout_width="wrap_content"
+                android:layout_height="wrap_content"
+                android:layout_centerVertical="true"
+                android:layout_toRightOf="@+id/icn_skin"
+                android:text="主题换肤"
+                android:textColor="@android:color/black"
+                android:textSize="15sp" />
+
+            <TextView
+                android:layout_width="wrap_content"
+                android:layout_height="wrap_content"
+                android:layout_alignParentRight="true"
+                android:layout_centerVertical="true"
+                android:layout_marginRight="20dp"
+                android:text="官方红"
+                android:textColor="#C0C0C0"
+                android:textSize="10sp" />
+        </RelativeLayout>
+    </LinearLayout>
+
+    <LinearLayout
+        android:layout_width="match_parent"
+        android:layout_height="45dp"
+        android:background="@drawable/item_background"
+        android:clickable="true"
+        android:focusable="true"
+        android:focusableInTouchMode="true"
+        android:gravity="center_vertical"
+        android:orientation="horizontal">
+
+        <RelativeLayout
+            android:layout_width="match_parent"
+            android:layout_height="match_parent">
+
+            <ImageView
+                android:id="@+id/icn_night"
+                android:layout_width="30dp"
+                android:layout_height="30dp"
+                android:layout_centerVertical="true"
+                android:layout_marginLeft="10dp"
+                android:layout_marginRight="10dp"
+                android:src="@mipmap/topmenu_icn_night" />
+
+            <TextView
+                android:layout_width="wrap_content"
+                android:layout_height="wrap_content"
+                android:layout_centerVertical="true"
+                android:layout_toRightOf="@+id/icn_night"
+                android:text="夜间模式"
+                android:textColor="@android:color/black"
+                android:textSize="15sp" />
+
+            <Switch
+                android:id="@+id/pin"
+                android:layout_width="wrap_content"
+                android:layout_height="wrap_content"
+                android:layout_alignParentRight="true"
+                android:layout_centerVertical="true"
+                android:layout_marginRight="20dp" />
+        </RelativeLayout>
+    </LinearLayout>
+
+    <LinearLayout
+        android:layout_width="match_parent"
+        android:layout_height="45dp"
+        android:background="@drawable/item_background"
+        android:clickable="true"
+        android:focusable="true"
+        android:focusableInTouchMode="true"
+        android:gravity="center_vertical"
+        android:orientation="horizontal">
+
+        <ImageView
+            android:layout_width="30dp"
+            android:layout_height="30dp"
+            android:layout_marginLeft="10dp"
+            android:layout_marginRight="10dp"
+            android:src="@mipmap/topmenu_icn_time" />
+
+        <TextView
+            android:layout_width="wrap_content"
+            android:layout_height="wrap_content"
+            android:text="定时停止播放"
+            android:textColor="@android:color/black"
+            android:textSize="15sp" />
+    </LinearLayout>
+
+    <LinearLayout
+        android:layout_width="match_parent"
+        android:layout_height="45dp"
+        android:background="@drawable/item_background"
+        android:clickable="true"
+        android:focusable="true"
+        android:focusableInTouchMode="true"
+        android:gravity="center_vertical"
+        android:orientation="horizontal">
+
+        <ImageView
+            android:layout_width="30dp"
+            android:layout_height="30dp"
+            android:layout_marginLeft="10dp"
+            android:layout_marginRight="10dp"
+            android:src="@mipmap/topmenu_icn_clock" />
+
+        <TextView
+            android:layout_width="wrap_content"
+            android:layout_height="wrap_content"
+            android:text="音乐闹钟"
+            android:textColor="@android:color/black"
+            android:textSize="15sp" />
+    </LinearLayout>
+
+    <LinearLayout
+        android:layout_width="match_parent"
+        android:layout_height="45dp"
+        android:background="@drawable/item_background"
+        android:clickable="true"
+        android:focusable="true"
+        android:focusableInTouchMode="true"
+        android:gravity="center_vertical"
+        android:orientation="horizontal">
+
+        <ImageView
+            android:layout_width="30dp"
+            android:layout_height="30dp"
+            android:layout_marginLeft="10dp"
+            android:layout_marginRight="10dp"
+            android:src="@mipmap/topmenu_icn_cloud" />
+
+        <TextView
+            android:layout_width="wrap_content"
+            android:layout_height="wrap_content"
+            android:text="我的音乐云盘"
+            android:textColor="@android:color/black"
+            android:textSize="15sp" />
+    </LinearLayout>
+</LinearLayout>
\ No newline at end of file

@@ -0,0 +1,88 @@
+<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
+
+<ScrollView xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android"
+    android:id="@+id/list_scrollView"
+    android:layout_width="match_parent"
+    android:layout_height="wrap_content"
+    android:layout_below="@+id/list_head"
+    android:layout_marginTop="20dp"
+    android:fillViewport="false"
+    android:scrollbarSize="10dp"
+    android:scrollbarStyle="insideInset"
+    android:scrollbars="none">
+
+    <LinearLayout
+        android:layout_width="match_parent"
+        android:layout_height="match_parent"
+        android:orientation="vertical">
+
+        <RelativeLayout
+            android:layout_width="match_parent"
+            android:layout_height="match_parent">
+
+            <LinearLayout
+                android:id="@+id/list_head"
+                android:layout_width="match_parent"
+                android:layout_height="22dp"
+                android:layout_gravity="center"
+                android:layout_marginTop="10dp"
+                android:orientation="horizontal">
+
+                <TextView
+                    android:layout_width="2dp"
+                    android:layout_height="match_parent"
+                    android:layout_marginLeft="10dp"
+                    android:background="@color/themeColor" />
+
+                <TextView
+                    android:layout_width="wrap_content"
+                    android:layout_height="match_parent"
+                    android:layout_gravity="center_horizontal"
+                    android:layout_marginLeft="5dp"
+                    android:text="全部歌单"
+                    android:textColor="#000000"
+                    android:textSize="16sp" />
+            </LinearLayout>
+
+            <RelativeLayout
+                android:id="@+id/list_layout"
+                android:layout_width="wrap_content"
+                android:layout_height="wrap_content"
+                android:layout_below="@+id/list_head"
+                android:layout_marginTop="10dp">
+
+                <include layout="@layout/list_image_layout" />
+            </RelativeLayout>
+
+
+            <LinearLayout
+                android:layout_width="wrap_content"
+                android:layout_height="wrap_content"
+                android:layout_below="@+id/list_layout"
+                android:layout_centerHorizontal="true"
+                android:layout_marginBottom="60dp"
+                android:layout_marginTop="10dp"
+                android:orientation="horizontal">
+
+                <ImageView
+                    android:id="@+id/anim_image"
+                    android:layout_width="25dp"
+                    android:layout_height="20dp"
+                    android:layout_toLeftOf="@+id/anim_text"
+                    android:padding="1dp"
+                    android:src="@drawable/loadanimation" />
+
+                <TextView
+                    android:id="@+id/anim_text"
+                    android:layout_width="wrap_content"
+                    android:layout_height="wrap_content"
+                    android:layout_centerHorizontal="true"
+                    android:layout_gravity="bottom"
+                    android:text="正在加载更多..."
+                    android:textColor="#000000"
+                    android:textSize="14sp" />
+            </LinearLayout>
+
+        </RelativeLayout>
+    </LinearLayout>
+</ScrollView>

@@ -0,0 +1,60 @@
+<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
+<LinearLayout xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android"
+    android:orientation="vertical" android:layout_width="match_parent"
+    android:layout_height="match_parent"
+    >
+        <LinearLayout
+            android:id="@+id/list_body_1"
+            android:layout_width="match_parent"
+            android:layout_height="150dp"
+            android:orientation="horizontal"
+            android:padding="2dp">
+
+            <ImageView
+                android:layout_width="110dp"
+                android:layout_height="150dp"
+                android:layout_marginLeft="10dp"
+                android:layout_marginRight="5dp"
+                android:layout_weight="1"
+                android:background="@drawable/dujia_1" />
+
+            <ImageView
+                android:layout_width="110dp"
+                android:layout_height="150dp"
+                android:layout_marginLeft="5dp"
+                android:layout_marginRight="5dp"
+                android:layout_weight="1"
+                android:background="@mipmap/radio_2" />
+
+        </LinearLayout>
+
+        <LinearLayout
+            android:id="@+id/list_body_2"
+            android:layout_width="match_parent"
+            android:layout_height="150dp"
+            android:layout_below="@+id/list_body_1"
+            android:layout_marginTop="10dp"
+            android:orientation="horizontal"
+            android:padding="2dp">
+
+            <ImageView
+                android:layout_width="110dp"
+                android:layout_height="150dp"
+                android:layout_marginLeft="10dp"
+                android:layout_marginRight="5dp"
+                android:layout_weight="1"
+                android:background="@drawable/dujia_3" />
+
+            <ImageView
+                android:layout_width="110dp"
+                android:layout_height="150dp"
+                android:layout_marginLeft="5dp"
+                android:layout_marginRight="5dp"
+                android:layout_weight="1"
+                android:background="@mipmap/radio_4" />
+        </LinearLayout>
+
+
+
+
+</LinearLayout>

@@ -0,0 +1,89 @@
+<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
+<RelativeLayout xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android"
+    android:layout_width="match_parent"
+    android:layout_height="match_parent">
+
+    <android.support.v4.view.ViewPager
+        android:id="@+id/viewPager"
+        android:layout_width="match_parent"
+        android:layout_height="match_parent" />
+
+    <LinearLayout
+        android:layout_width="match_parent"
+        android:layout_height="wrap_content"
+        android:layout_alignParentBottom="true"
+        android:gravity="center_horizontal"
+        android:layout_marginBottom="10dp"
+        android:orientation="horizontal">
+
+        <RelativeLayout
+            android:layout_width="match_parent"
+            android:layout_height="match_parent">
+
+            <View
+                android:id="@+id/v_dot1"
+                android:layout_width="9dp"
+                android:layout_height="9dp"
+                android:layout_centerInParent="true"
+                android:layout_toLeftOf="@+id/v_dot2"
+                android:background="@mipmap/red_point" />
+
+            <View
+                android:id="@+id/v_dot2"
+                android:layout_width="9dp"
+                android:layout_height="9dp"
+                android:layout_marginStart="3dp"
+                android:layout_centerInParent="true"
+                android:layout_toLeftOf="@+id/v_dot3"
+                android:background="@mipmap/grey_point" />
+
+            <View
+                android:id="@+id/v_dot3"
+                android:layout_width="9dp"
+                android:layout_height="9dp"
+                android:layout_marginStart="3dp"
+                android:layout_centerInParent="true"
+                android:layout_toLeftOf="@+id/v_dot4"
+                android:background="@mipmap/grey_point" />
+
+            <View
+                android:id="@+id/v_dot4"
+                android:layout_width="9dp"
+                android:layout_marginStart="3dp"
+                android:layout_height="9dp"
+                android:layout_centerInParent="true"
+                android:background="@mipmap/grey_point" />
+
+            <View
+                android:id="@+id/v_dot5"
+                android:layout_width="9dp"
+                android:layout_marginStart="3dp"
+                android:layout_height="9dp"
+                android:layout_centerInParent="true"
+                android:layout_toRightOf="@+id/v_dot4"
+                android:background="@mipmap/grey_point" />
+
+            <View
+                android:id="@+id/v_dot6"
+                android:layout_width="9dp"
+                android:layout_marginStart="3dp"
+                android:layout_height="9dp"
+                android:layout_centerInParent="true"
+                android:layout_gravity="center"
+                android:layout_toRightOf="@+id/v_dot5"
+                android:background="@mipmap/grey_point" />
+
+            <View
+                android:id="@+id/v_dot7"
+                android:layout_marginStart="3dp"
+                android:layout_width="9dp"
+                android:layout_height="9dp"
+                android:layout_centerInParent="true"
+                android:layout_toRightOf="@+id/v_dot6"
+                android:background="@mipmap/grey_point" />
+
+
+        </RelativeLayout>
+
+    </LinearLayout>
+</RelativeLayout>

+<menu xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android">

+    <item
+    android:id="@+id/item_identify"
+    android:icon="@mipmap/topmenu_icn_identify"
+    android:title="听歌识曲" />
+    <item
+    android:id="@+id/item_skin"
+    android:icon="@mipmap/topmenu_icn_skin"
+    android:title="主题换肤" />
+    <item
+    android:id="@+id/item_night"
+    android:icon="@mipmap/topmenu_icn_night"
+    android:title="夜间模式" />
+    <item
+    android:id="@+id/item_time"
+    android:icon="@mipmap/topmenu_icn_time"
+    android:title="定时停止播放" />
+    <item
+    android:id="@+id/item_clock"

+    android:title="音乐闹钟" />
+    <item
+    android:id="@+id/item_cloud"
+    android:icon="@mipmap/topmenu_icn_cloud"
+    android:title="我的音乐云盘" />
+    </group>
+
+
+</menu>

@@ -0,0 +1,67 @@
+<resources>
+
+    <!-- Base application theme. -->
+    <style name="AppTheme" parent="Base.AppTheme">
+        <!-- Customize your theme here. -->
+        <item name="android:textColor">?android:textColorPrimary</item>
+        <item name="android:textColorHighlight">?android:textColorHighlight</item>
+        <item name="android:textColorHint">?android:textColorHint</item>
+        <item name="android:textColorLink">?android:textColorLink</item>
+
+
+    </style>
+
+    <style name="ImageTranslucentTheme" parent="AppTheme">
+        <item name="android:windowNoTitle">true</item>
+        <item name="android:windowIsTranslucent">true</item>
+        <!--在Android 4.4之前的版本上运行，直接跟随系统主题-->
+    </style>
+
+    <style name="SplashTheme" parent="Theme.AppCompat.NoActionBar">
+        <item name="android:windowActionBar">false</item>
+        <item name="android:windowFullscreen">true</item>
+        <item name="android:windowBackground">@drawable/login_splash</item>
+    </style>
+
+    <style name="ToolbarStyle" parent="@style/ThemeOverlay.AppCompat.Dark.ActionBar">
+        <item name="actionBarItemBackground">@drawable/toolbarItemBackground</item>
+        <item name="selectableItemBackground">@drawable/toolbarItemBackground</item>
+        <item name="titleTextAppearance">@style/ToolBar.Title</item>
+        <item name="subtitleTextAppearance">@style/Toolbar.SubTitle</item>
+        <item name="android:windowNoTitle">true</item>
+    </style>
+
+    <style name="ToolBar.Title" parent="@style/TextAppearance.Widget.AppCompat.Toolbar.Title">
+        <item name="android:textSize">17.0sp</item>
+        <item name="android:textColor">@color/toolbarTextColor</item>
+    </style>
+
+    <style name="Toolbar.SubTitle" parent="@style/TextAppearance.Widget.AppCompat.Toolbar.Subtitle">
+        <item name="android:textSize">12.0sp</item>
+        <item name="android:textColor">#ff928e91</item>
+    </style>
+
+    <style name="Base.AppTheme" parent="@style/Theme.AppCompat.Light">
+        <item name="android:windowBackground">@color/normalBackground</item>
+        <item name="android:windowIsTranslucent">true</item>
+        <item name="android:windowContentOverlay">@null</item>
+        <item name="android:fadingEdgeLength">0.0dip</item>
+        <item name="windowNoTitle">true</item>
+        <item name="android:windowNoTitle">true</item>
+        <item name="android:windowActionBar">false</item>
+        <!--<item name="windowActionModeOverlay">true</item>-->
+        <!--<item name="searchViewStyle">@style/MySearchViewStyle</item>-->
+        <!--<item name="colorPrimary">@color/theme_color_Primary</item>-->
+        <!--<item name="colorPrimaryDark">@color/theme_color_PrimaryDark</item>-->
+        <!--<item name="colorAccent">@color/theme_color_PrimaryAccent</item>-->
+    </style>
+
+    <style name="MySearchViewStyle" parent="@style/Widget.AppCompat.SearchView" />
+
+
+    <style name="anim_menu_bottombar">
+        <item name="android:windowEnterAnimation">@anim/menu_bottombar_in</item>
+        <item name="android:windowExitAnimation">@anim/menu_bottombar_out</item>
+    </style>
+
+</resources>
